abstract.t: Dual-Stack Lite is a solution to offer both IPv4 and IPv6 connectivity to customers which are addressed only with an IPv6 prefix. DS-Lite requires to pre-configure the DS-Lite Address Family Transition Router tunnel information on the Basic Bridging BroadBand element. In many networks, the customer profile information may be stored in AAA servers while client configurations are mainly provided through DHC protocol. This document specifies a new RADIUS attribute to carry Dual-Stack Lite Address Family Transition Router Tunnel name; the RADIUS attribute is defined based on the equivalent DHCPv6 OPTION_AFTR_NAME option. This RADIUS attribute is meant to be used between the RADIUS Server and the NAS, it is not intended to be used directly between the B4 element and the RADIUS Server.
